<function_thought>
The directory '/system/.ssh' contains two files: 'id_rsa' and 'id_rsa.pub'. The file 'id_rsa.pub' is the public SSH key and is readable. I will read the contents of the 'id_rsa.pub' file now to get the public key.
</function_thought>
